channel.title: Stupid little fires on the side of the screen >:o
channel.description: you all know those torches that have the fire on the login screen...well i have a demise pking source and client...make it go away lol :P thanks

item.title: Stupid little fires on the side of the screen >:o
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

[quote=“Mage mad nes, post:4, topic:360000”]I had the same problem, Though i removed mine do do this do the following things below:

Open Client.Java and Press Ctrl + F then search for logo, The first result you should see something like this:

[quote]
class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(-180, -171, -32357);
class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(aClass44_1053, “logo”, 0);
aClass15_1107.method237(0);
class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method348(382 - class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1440 / 2 - 128, 16083, 18);

        class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = null;
        Object obj = null;
        Object obj1 = null;
        System.gc();
        return;[/quote]

When you see it, delete it. That will Remove the “RuneScape” Logo above of the login box. Now to do the flames and remove them do this:
Open Client.Java Pres Ctrl+F and search for “method58(25106)”
You should see something like this:

[quote] method58(25106);
method58(25106);
method133((byte)9);
if(++i > 10)[/quote]

Now just put // before those 4 lines, save, compile and re run client! after you comment them out it should look like this:

[quote] //method58(25106);
//method58(25106);
//method133((byte)9);
//if(++i > 10)[/quote]

Credits: 100% = Me
Sources: Coding for 3 years pays off. [/quote]

THANK YOU SO MUCH you’re a life saver and jesus. i love you. no homo

Read full topic
item.source: Stupid little fires on the side of the screen >:o

item.title: Stupid little fires on the side of the screen >:o
item.dc:creator: @Mage_mad_nes Mage mad nes
item.description:
@Mage_mad_nes wrote:

I had the same problem, Though i removed mine do do this do the following things below:

Open Client.Java and Press Ctrl + F then search for logo, The first result you should see something like this:

class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(-180, -171, -32357); class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(aClass44_1053, "logo", 0); aClass15_1107.method237(0); class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method348(382 - class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1440 / 2 - 128, 16083, 18); 
        class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = null;
        Object obj = null;
        Object obj1 = null;
        System.gc();
        return;</blockquote>

When you see it, delete it. That will Remove the “RuneScape” Logo above of the login box. Now to do the flames and remove them do this:
Open Client.Java Pres Ctrl+F and search for “method58(25106)”
You should see something like this:

method58(25106); method58(25106); method133((byte)9); if(++i > 10)

Now just put // before those 4 lines, save, compile and re run client! after you comment them out it should look like this:

//method58(25106); //method58(25106); //method133((byte)9); //if(++i > 10)

Credits: 100% = Me
Sources: Coding for 3 years pays off.

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid little fires on the side of the screen >:o
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

[quote=“Arsys, post:2, topic:360000”]If it’s the background client, just change it and put the one you want in your sprites folder in client.
If it’s not that, may you please post a picture so I could help?[/quote]

idk how to take a pic of it and get it on here, but think of the classic runescape page with the torches on the side and that door in the middle, its those flames on the side there. they dont dissappear even though i changed the background.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Arsys Arsys
item.description:
@Arsys wrote:

If it’s the background client, just change it and put the one you want in your sprites folder in client.
If it’s not that, may you please post a picture so I could help?
